greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of Sort then Add steps needed to reach a sorted number, or -1 if never reach sorted number.
example: 64 -> 64+46=110 -> 110+11=121 -> 121+112 = 233, taking 3 steps to reach a sorted number, so a(64)=3.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
